description: This Dart file defines a custom Flutter theme named 'Ocean Theme'. It constructs ThemeData with specific color schemes, typography, and component styles, emphasizing a minimalist aesthetic with a defined color palette. It provides a function to build and return this theme data, which can be used throughout a Flutter app to ensure visual consistency.

classes.name: _OceanExtraColors
classes.description: A custom ThemeExtension to expose additional colors (particularly 'success') in the ThemeData, enabling easy access to specialized colors beyond the default palette.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a custom ThemeData object configured with a minimalist, color-coordinated style, suitable for applications requiring the 'Ocean' theme. It accepts an optional Brightness parameter for light/dark mode customization.
